raw_content: {"internal_thinking": "The game state indicates all hexes are 'D' (Desert), meaning no resources will be produced anywhere on the board. All nodes are isolated and yield nothing. The only distinguishing feature is a '?3' port at Node 0. Since no node provides any resource benefit, placing the settlement on Node 0 is as good as any other, and it might be a valid starting point if the board is somehow dynamically generated later or if this is a test scenario with a broken board. I must make a valid move according to the allowed actions.", "action": {"type": "place_starting_settlement", "parameters": "{\"node\": 0}"}}

parsed.internal_thinking: The game state indicates all hexes are 'D' (Desert), meaning no resources will be produced anywhere on the board. All nodes are isolated and yield nothing. The only distinguishing feature is a '?3' port at Node 0. Since no node provides any resource benefit, placing the settlement on Node 0 is as good as any other, and it might be a valid starting point if the board is somehow dynamically generated later or if this is a test scenario with a broken board. I must make a valid move according to the allowed actions. [Response was too brief]
